description: This service enables real-time verification of Aadhaar numbers directly through UIDAI (Unique Identification Authority of India) systems. It validates the authenticity of Aadhaar numbers and retrieves essential demographic information including state, gender, age range, and mobile number linkage status for comprehensive individual onboarding and KYC compliance.
llm_summary: Aadhaar Number Verification (UIDAI) provides real-time validation of Aadhaar numbers through official UIDAI channels. Returns demographic details including state, gender, age range, and mobile linkage status for robust individual identity verification and onboarding workflows.
use_cases: Individual customer onboarding for financial institutions and banks.
Age verification for age-restricted services and products.
Demographic validation for insurance and healthcare applications.
Mobile number linkage verification for enhanced security.
Government compliance for services requiring Aadhaar verification.
Real-time identity validation for digital lending platforms.
State-wise customer segmentation and regional compliance.

request_schema.description: User consent for Aadhaar data processing and verification

response_schema.description: Overall status of the API response
Unique identifier for the API request
HTTP status code for the service response

lastDigits.description: Last few digits of the Aadhaar number

state.description: State associated with the Aadhaar number

isMobile.description: Indicates if mobile number is linked to Aadhaar

ageRange.description: Age range of the Aadhaar holder (e.g., '30-40')

lessInfo.description: Indicates if limited information is available

sequence.description: Sequence number of vendor in the workflow
